amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to be used to develop or submit a proposal to expand the authorized uses of the Harbor Maintenance Trust Fund described in section 9505(c) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to develop or submit a proposal to expand the authorized uses of the Harbor Maintenance Trust Fund described in section 9505(c) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cravaack amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cravaack amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A039) offered by Mr. Cravaack.
